author: Blake Hester
title: ‪Two days in Colombia with the founder of Rockstar San Diego
description: Angel Studios founder Diego Angel left Rockstar and returned home to Colombia before the release of Red Dead Redemption, so we went to meet him there
content:
Diego Angel is stumped. Really stumped. Try as he might, he cant seem to find the answer hes looking for. Maybe 10, 20 minutes pass, and still nothing. 
He says he doesnt know why he moved back to Medellín, Colombia. 
On the one hand, he says he always knew… [+37463 chars]
